title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4033 - Weighing Out
content:

§ 4033.1 - Time for weighing out
§ 4033.2 - [Repealed]
§ 4033.3 - Items weighed with jockey
§ 4033.4 - Declaration of overweight

§ 4033.8 - Equipment regulated

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4033

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1982, ch. 865, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
